price: 149. En waar u uw gebeden ook begint, wend uw gezicht in de richting van de Masdjied al-Haram, dat is zeker de waarheid van uw Heer. En Allah is niet onachtzaam overwat jullie doen.
arabic: وَمِنۡ حَيۡثُ خَرَجۡتَ فَوَلِّ وَجۡهَكَ شَطۡرَ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamin ḥaythu kharajta fawalli wajhaka shaṭra al-masjidi al-ḥarāmi wa-innahu lalḥaqqu min rabbika wamā al-lahu bighāfilin ʿammā taʿmalūna
